#summary The page lists external libraries, which are used by the application and points to their location.
#labels Featured

The IPLab application uses numerous of open source components, which are listed below:
  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/dockpanelsuite/ DockManager Control] by Weifen Luo (IPLab still uses an old version which was published on CodeProject);
  * [http://www.codeproject.com/KB/grid/csharpgridcontrol.aspx SourceGrid - Open Source C# Grid Control] by Davide Icardi;
  * [http://www.codeproject.com/KB/menus/ToolBarDock.aspx A Simple C# Toolbar Docking Framework] by Rog√©rio Paulo.

Thank to all these projects and people, who support them.
